settings.heading: Raleigh Thanksgiving Meal Delivery
settings.text:
Preparing a multi-course Thanksgiving meal can be nerve-wracking. Between basting the turkey and stringing the green beans, there’s little time to enjoy your friends and family. Fortunately, Table & Twine has a better solution.

With our Raleigh Thanksgiving meal kit, you can whip up a lavish dinner in no time. Since our talented culinary team handles 90% of the cooking for you, you’ll just need to heat, garnish, and serve.

settings.heading: How Our Thanksgiving Meal Kits Work
settings.text:
At Table & Twine, our mission is to connect people through delicious yet convenient food. That’s why our Thanksgiving meal kits in Raleigh come with all the pre-measured and pre-prepared ingredients you need to host a festive gathering. You’ll just need to add some finishing touches to bring the meal together.

We offer a decadent Thanksgiving meal package with all the fixings. We also offer à la carte holiday items, including [description here].

settings.title: Classic Flavors With a Twist
settings.text: Our talented chefs are passionate about developing recipes that provide customers with an at-home culinary experience. With this in mind, our Thanksgiving menu elevates classic flavors by incorporating seasonal produce, farm-raised proteins, and tantalizing spices. The result is sure to please all palettes.

settings.title: Convenient Meal Preparation for Hosts
settings.text: At Table & Twine, we want to take the drudgery out of hosting Thanksgiving. Since our chefs prepare 90% of the feast, you won’t need to rush around chopping and stirring. Instead, you can relax and unwind with guests.

settings.title: Fewer Dishes and Less Cleanup
settings.text: Perhaps the worst part about Thanksgiving is the messy cleanup: greasy roasting pans, crusty gravy boats, cranberry-stained cutting boards. But with our Raleigh Thanksgiving meal kits, you’ll have way less to wash. That’s because many of our dishes can be cooked in their original packaging.

settings.heading: Why Choose a Thanksgiving Meal Kit?
settings.text: When you order a convenient meal kit from Table & Twine, you’ll be thankful for a delicious, restaurant-quality feast that impresses friends and family alike. You’ll also be thankful for:

settings.title: How much time is required to prepare the food in my Thanksgiving meal kit?
settings.text: Set aside about three hours to prepare your Thanksgiving meal. Our chefs will walk you through the cooking process with step-by-step heating instructions.

settings.title: How far in advance do I need to order my Thanksgiving meal kit?
settings.text: To receive your meal kit for Thanksgiving, please place an order by [insert date]. However, you can always order early!

settings.title: Can I customize my Thanksgiving meal kit?
settings.text: Table & Twine meal kits cannot be customized. But with a variety of side dishes and desserts, there’s something for everyone.
